question.body: Which sphincter muscle is not correctly described?

multiple_choice.choice: Esophageal sphincter- separates the esophagus from the stomach
Pyloric sphincter- separates the small intestine from the large intestine.
Anal sphincter- under conscious control and relaxes during defecation

response.feedback: Incorrect. The esophageal sphincter does separate the esophagus from the stomach.
Correct. The pyloric sphincter separates the stomach and the small intestine.
Incorrect. The anal sphincter does relax during defecation.
